AIsystem.来源: Amazon has been listing products with the title, 'I'm sorry, I cannot fulfil this request as it goes against OpenAI use policy'

Risk.来源: Amazon Is Selling Products With AI-Generated Names Like "I Cannot Fulfill This Request It Goes Against OpenAI Use Policy"

Consequence.来源: Lazy use of AI leads to Amazon products called "I cannot fulfill that request"
